tool_description: An API to show all the latest news on the Greek Superleague.
name: Greek Superleague Live News
title: Greek Superleague Live News

api_list.name: Get Individual News
api_list.description: Get Individual News from specific outlet
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greek-superleague-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/sport24"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greek-superleague-live-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://greek-superleague-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greek-superleague-live-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
